title: Nintendo confirmed to say: "u filthy westerners don't even get to pretend to touch anime women."

embed.description: Despite rumors to the contrary, it appears the "skinship" encounters in Fire Emblem Fates have not been removed for the English version - at least, not entirely.

body:
Fire emblem fates got censored on its way to western audiences.

As expected, western audiences can't handle things such as petting. Such would be offensive to anime characters and definitely innapropriate for us westerners.
